name: timeless shawl - twister
notes:
our skilled danish designers created this simple and pretty [timeless shawl][1]. we know this will be your new, everlasting favourite. the [shawl][2] is worked in hobbii twister. this yarn is a soft and fantastic "cake yarn", available in a wide range of beautiful colour combinations with long gradient colourways. pick your favourite colour and leave it up to twister create your timeless shawl. have fun!

**materials:**
- hobbii twister
- crochet hook 4 mm (us size g/6)

**measurements:**
 approx. 170 x 66 cm 

**usage:** 
1 ball [twister][3]

**abbreviations:**
**ch**: chain stitch
**st**: stitch / stitches
**sc**: single crochet
**dc**: double crochet
**tr**: treble crochet
**rdcf**: raised double crochet front 
**rdcb**: raised double crochet back 
**ch-space**: chain-space


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/timeless-shawl-twister?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=timeless-shawl-twister&utm_term=swr
  [2]: https://hobbii.com/hobbii-twister?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=twister&utm_term=swr
